task.title: Sharing my screen
task.shortdesc: By default, you can share your screen with all meeting participants during a meeting.

taskbody.prereq:
To share your screen, the following conditions must be met:
Browser permissions must be granted.
This feature must be enabled. For assistance, contact your server administrator.
On a macOS, screen recording permissions are required. For more information, refer to .

context.p: When enabled, you can share your screen during a meeting. To start presenting, follow these steps.

step.cmd: Scroll over the bottom of the meeting window and select the Start presenting () button.
Choose which part of the screen is shared.

choices.choice: Entire Screen—select this option to show your entire screen, including all open applications, browsers, and tabs.
Window—select this option to show a specific window to your audience.
Chrome Tab—select this option to show a specific web browser tab.

info.note: Only one presenter can share their screen at a time.
